AVSEC ORDER No. 19/2011 
 
Subject : -  Contingency Plan for handling aircraft hijack situation-2011 
 
 
 
In the exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act, 1934, 
delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification 
No 1797 dated 03rd July 1997, for the purpose of securing the aircraft operations 
and access control at the civil airports in India, the Commissioner of Security 
(CA) directs that the enclosed Contingency Plan for handling aircraft hijack 
situation, which has been updated to comply with the requirements of Standards 
of Annex-17 to the Convention on International Civil Aviation, shall be 
implemented by all agencies connected with aviation security in India. 
 
2. 
This is in continuation of guidelines issued by MCA vide Office 
Memorandum No AV.133024/2/2000-SS dated 13 September 2005. 
 
3. 
Any violation of this AVSEC Order shall attract penalty under Section 11A 
of the Aircraft Act, 1934. 
 
 
 
 
(Gurjot Singh Malhi, IPS) 
Commissioner of Security (CA)
